definition: pad/cushion/mat/to pad out/to fill a gap/to pay for sb/to advance (money)
to support/to sustain/to erect/to raise/branch/division/to draw money/classifier for rods such as pens and guns, for army divisions and for songs or compositions

sentences.english: Any subscription fee paid shall be non-refundable in all circumstances.
sentences.chinese: 已繳付之服務費概不發還，亦不能墊支其它費用。
